name: Zombie Killer: Fight Duty 2
description:
Zombie Killer: Fight Duty 2 is very thrilling and entertaining shooting games zombie. Hunt zombie with no mercy, in our new shooting games for you will get the skills of shooting and make the better range of hunting target, Zombie in this shooting game are very scary and fearful and you must like to shoot them with no mercy, you will see in our new action games of zombie that the zombies are attacking towards you and they try to kill you too but you have to protect yourself and shoot them before they attack on you and injured your face.
Features:
- An immersive first-person 3D adventure blending graphics
- Excellent music and realistic sound effects
- Experience exciting shooting gameplay against zombies
- Kill different kinds of zombies
- Many weapons available
- Slow motion actions
- Amazing graphics.
